Name: Junior M
AboutMe:
Systems Analyst degree in Information Systems from Estacio de Sa University. Fluent in English and Spanish. Solid experience throughout the life cycle of software development. Working for over 15 years designing, building and deploying solutions for areas like Human Resources, Finance, Publishing, Telecommunications, Entertainment, Healthcare and Logistics.

– 10 years of experience in systems analysis, requirements gathering, object-oriented analysis, data modeling, technical specification.

– 15 years in systems development, maintenance and testing for national and international companies.

– 3 years interacting with professionals from different countries, of which 2 years playing technical project leadership role abroad, delegating and following up tasks.

Specialties: Systems analysis and development, BPM - Business Process Management, SCRUM and XP Agile Methodologies, Unit Testing and TDD, Continuous Integration. Technologies: C#, ASP.NET, ASP.NET AJAX, ASP.NET MVC, Windows Client, WPF, WCF, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML4/5, DHTML, CSS3, XML, XSD, XAML, SQL Server, PHP, MySQL, Bizagi Process Modeler, Enterprise Architect, Visio, Balsamiq Mockups.
